Overall, this is an example of a widely-implemented community-based programme, with 
probable impact that has not been evaluated. An estimate of 1.5 ppt/year improvement from 
the programme seems reasonable from the data published by year and province by the 
MoH-National Institute of Nutrition ( 56).
